means: 不在乎地，鲁莽地，不顾一切地

sentence.Network_en: He was leaning recklessly out of the unshuttered window.
sentence.Network_cn: 他冒冒失失地从没有遮拦的窗户探出身去。

sentence.Network_en: A congressional report charges that federal safety laws were recklessly violated.
sentence.Network_cn: 一份国会报告指责联邦安全法被公然违反。

sentence.Network_en: If you drive as recklessly as that, you'll end in hospital.
sentence.Network_cn: 要是你开车老是那样鲁莽, 总有一天要住进医院.

所谓轻率（recklessly）,是指行为人虽然已经认识到自己的行为具有可能产生危害社会结果的危险，但他漠视这种危险而实行了这种行 …

entry.tran: 轻率的;不计后果的;鲁莽的;无所顾忌的
entry.def: If you say that someone is reckless, you mean that they act in a way which shows that they do not care about danger or the effect their behaviour will have on other people.

example.ex: She loved to ride; on horseback, she was reckless and utterly without fear...
example.tran: 她喜欢骑马；在马背上，她纵横驰骋，毫无畏惧。

example.ex: He is charged with causing death by reckless driving.
example.tran: 他被控危险驾驶致人死亡。

auth_sentence.content: If Iceland behaved recklessly, Britain behaved stupidly.
auth_sentence.res_content: If Iceland behaved recklessly, Britain behaved stupidly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If Iceland behaved recklessly, Britain behaved stupidly.

auth_sentence.content: They drove more recklessly and crashed more often.
auth_sentence.res_content: They drove more recklessly and crashed more often.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They drove more recklessly and crashed more often.

auth_sentence.content: Man has always studied nature but we are changing it recklessly.
auth_sentence.res_content: Man has always studied nature but we are changing it recklessly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Man has always studied nature but we are changing it recklessly.

means.word_mean: 不在乎地;鲁莽地;不顾一切地

sentences.en: He was arrested for driving recklessly.
If you drive as recklessly as that,you’ll end in hospital.
sentences.cn: 要是你开车老是那样鲁莽,总有一天要住进医院。

sentences.en: He drove so recklessly that he collided with a tree and landed up in hospital.
sentences.cn: 他开车太鲁莽,结果撞到一棵树上,最终进了医院。
